testsuite.name: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: ACME Workitems Page displays page title
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: ACME Workitems Page displays page title Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 38.537s Then There is a title shown on the page ... passed in 0.380s And The title tag contains "Work Items" ... passed in 0.062s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays navigation bar
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays navigation bar Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 57.376s Then The navigation bar header "ACME System 1" is displayed ... passed in 0.078s And The navigation link "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.142s And The navigation link "Log Out" is displayed ... passed in 0.109s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays breadcrumbs
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays breadcrumbs Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 40.232s Then The breadcrumb "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.242s And The breadcrumb "Work Items" is displayed ... passed in 0.355s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays footer
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays footer Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 27.884s Then There is a footer shown on the page ... passed in 0.061s And The text displayed is "Copyright Â© 2020 ACME Systems" ... passed in 0.064s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays Work Items Panel
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays Work Items Panel Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 43.040s Then The panel header displays "Search Results" ... passed in 0.112s And The panel text displays "Please find below your work items. They need to be completed in the order specified by your manager." ... passed in 0.114s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays Work Items Table
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays Work Items Table Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 44.767s Then The table displays row headers ... passed in 0.294s And The table displays max of 10 rows ... passed in 0.070s And Each row contains "search" icon ... passed in 0.060s And Each row contains "trash" icon ... passed in 0.070s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays page numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays page numbers Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 44.932s Then The page numbers are displayed ... passed in 0.047s And "1" page number is "displayed" and "not enabled" ... passed in 0.176s And ">" page number is "displayed" and "enabled" ... passed in 0.674s And "<" page number is "not displayed" and "not enabled" ... passed in 0.043s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Work items from DB are all displayed
